Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef.geometry.planar.Ring

  • Packages that use Ring 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.gef.geometry.convert.swt
    This package provides support for converting geometric objects to SWT and for conversion between SWT and AWT.
    org.eclipse.gef.geometry.planar
    This package provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes.
